cause.description:
The enviroment is out to get us. Let's take the bastard out first! We must preserve humanity for our children, by taking out it's natural threat: the environment! Tsunamis, hurricanes, earthquakes, tornadoes, floods, volcanoes, and other environmental Weapons of Mass Destruction (WMD's) hit humanity every day, and kill countless millions each year. It must be put to an end. The threat must be destroyed!
1. The destruction of the environment.
2. The eradication of volcanoes, floods, tsunamis, earthquakes, tornadoes, and hurricanes.
3. Human superiority over the Earth.
cause.mission: Destroy the environment before it destroys us!
cause.name: Destroy the environment!
